A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The most unpredictable star wars movie.  One surprise after another. \nI would venture to say one of the most Epic space battles in the franchise's history. It might have a few flaws\, but as a star wars fan who has been hooked since being taken to the drive in to see episode 4 when i was a small child\, I could not be more hopeful for the future of this franchise than I was after walking out of the cinema when the credits rolled for Last Jedi.
